JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
 
 Focus:
Digital Workplace / Site Services is looking for a skilled and enthusiastic Project Manager with an enquiring mind and tons of energy to be responsible for the planning, coordination, and status reporting from initiation to implementation of engineering projects. The candidate will achieve team productivity and agility by demonstrating Agile/Scrum concepts and principles. We are looking for someone who understands technology and can showcase servant leadership qualities to help a team deliver at its best.
Organizational Context:
Individual contributor working on a team responsible for delivering development projects or programs and platform enhancements  
How will you make an impact in this role?

Facilitates scrum ceremonies, daily stand-ups and DOR sessions with delivery teams
Works with the product owners to develop a prioritize team backlog
Support product owners by ensuring regular backlog refinement activities occur for team
Ensures resource dependency alignment across teams
Execute the Program Increment (PI) objectives to support the strategy, vision and road map
Generate and facilitate approval of digital Agile Charter every PI 
Support product owners by ensuring process documentation and flowcharts are created and maintained 
Keep updated with latest SDLC Agile compliance standards and audit points
Ensure dashboards for Planning and Audit are maintained and reviewed with team
Ensure team Confluence site is maintained and reflects Sprint changes
Create data-driven insights into the delivery and execution of the team using relevant team level metrics
Raises impediments, handles risks, dependencies, and resourcing needs
Support and encourage innovation through continuous exploration
Identifies and tracks key project achievements 
Ensures all systems of record for project reporting are kept current, and directs and monitors work efforts on a regular basis 

Education & Experience:

Bachelor’s Degree in related field required 
Prior relevant technology and business work experience
Certification(s) in agile or scrum a plus

 High Performance Behaviors:

Ability to handle project resources and achievement timelines 
Ability to track and mitigate program risks 
Ability to ensure program work meets compliance and regulatory obligations
Ability to handle and facilitate multiple product teams

 
Knowledge/Skills:

Experience with Jira a plus 
Familiarity with ITIL/ITSM best practices
Familiarity with ServiceNow a plus
Be flexible and adapt to change easily and often
Technical acumen and ability to understand the team’s technical platforms and applications
Facilitate technical solution alignment discussions
Coach team in Lean-Agile practices and mindsets
Live the Agile and SAFe Values and Principles
Encourage diversity of thought and demonstrate an open mindset
Foster a culture of trust and leadership in others
Champion a learning culture to drive continuous improvements and standardization
Respectfully and purposefully challenge the status quo
Promotes compliance with SDLC standards across the team
Ensures data integrity for the team within the Agile Management tools

 Technology Skills You'll Use Every Day:

Adaptive Communication
Agile Practices
Industry and Company Knowledge
Organizational Change
Technical Acuity
Technology Industry Trends

 
Game Changers:

Flexibility
Collaboration & Partnership
Continuous Improvement
Courage
Curiosity
Resourcefulness
Servant Leadership
Tenacity

 
 Role/Strengths You’ll Need:
Functional

Portfolio, Program, and Project Support 
Project Management 

 
Leadership

Analytical Thinking
Decision Making Influence
Relationship Management 

 
Business

Planning & Organizing
Problem Solving

Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
